channel.title: Samemo on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Samemo on ZooBerry

item.title: Shadow Wolf
item.description: Shadow Wolves are PURE black wolves that ONLY live on Princess royal island (the island of the Spirit Bear).

item.title: Bonobo
item.description: Bonobos live in the forests located centrally in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly Zaire).

item.title: Chacoan Peccary
item.description: The Chacoan peccary’s bristly coat is a speckled charcoal or brownish-grey, interspersed with long guard hairs.

item.title: Mini Volcano
item.description: Guests will love this mini form of the volcano, especially when it is erupting steam.

item.title: Piranha
item.description: These piranhas will form interesting schools in your jungle tanks.

item.title: AA Photo Stand
item.description: This stand contains photos of each of the 20 animals featured in the African Adventures expansion pack.
